metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2400 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in wp-includes/js/swfobject.js in WordPress before 3.3.2 has unknown impact and attack vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfourteen - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentythirteen - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwelve - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.2+dfsg-1').
